content: Notably, in our Phase 1 trial for ziftomenib two-thirds of NPM1-mutant AML patients who achieved a CR at 600 milligrams had either IDH and/or FLT3 co-mutations, all of whom had failed prior treatment with IDH and/or FLT3 inhibitors. We intend to evaluate safety, tolerability and preliminary antitumor activity of KO-2806 in a Phase 1 dose-escalation trial, which weâre calling FIT-001 as a monotherapy and in combination with other targeted therapies in adult patients with advanced solid tumors.
